A C D E F G I M N R S

C

Cell - Class in framework
The class specifies the attributes of each cell in the grid of the game.
Cell(int, int, int) - Constructor for class framework.Cell
The constructor that sets the state of each cell
Client - package Client
 
Client - Class in Client
This demonstrates where the points that the client can plugin to (the color array, the custom rule, the initial world) The user has to set rule, if it doesn't then it will run The Game of Life If the user sets rule, then they have to set a colorMap or pictureMap or it will not function correctly
Client() - Constructor for class Client.Client
 
Constants - Class in Default
The class contains some default constants that will be used if the client plugin doesn't specify the values.
Constants() - Constructor for class Default.Constants
